page.title: 06OUR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school was built eleven years ago.We have a great big playing field which is owned by the Mary Wheatley Trust. Hot cafeteria meals are available in the school for 58p but half the children bring a packed lunch. Noone goes home at dinnertime. In the playground we play marbles, stuck in the mud and on our apparatus. When it is wet we play indoors with chess, ludo, cards on, the computer or wedraw. Every year we have a concert. We have done Joseph and his Technicolour Dream Coat, zThe Horse of Wood and this year we are doing Out of this World. Everyone joins in the singing but some people have speaking or soslo singing parts.
